item.title: Mentioned by Western Wheel
item.description:
Menzies wants federal government to protect High River
Macleod MP Ted Menzies said he has a lot of “political capital” built up after nine years in Parliament and he's prepared to put to use to work on the town's behalf. He said there have been several of proposals made over the years for ways to protect High River ...

item.title: Mentioned by All about feed
item.description:
Canada celebrates success of wheat and barley check-offs
Canadian Member of Parliament, Ted Menzies, has highlighted the success of wheat and barley check-offs over the past year. Canada celebrates success of wheat and barley check-offs. "Research and market development activities are vital for the Western ...

item.title: Mentioned by Marketwire (press release)
item.description:
Harper Government Celebrates Success of Wheat and Barley Check-Offs
CLARESHOLM, ALBERTA--(Marketwired - July 31, 2013) - The Honourable Ted Menzies, Member of Parliament for Macleod, on behalf of Agriculture Minister Gerry Ritz, today highlighted the success of wheat and barley check-offs over the past year.

item.title: Mentioned by Grainews
item.description:
Menzies, Ablonczy won't run again in 2015
Ted Menzies, a grain farmer and former president of the Canadian Agri-Food Trade Alliance and Western Canadian Wheat Growers Association, and MP for the southern Alberta riding of Macleod since 2004, announced Tuesday he will not seek re-election in ...

item.title: Mentioned by The Daily Courier (subscription)
item.description:
Calgary Conservative MP Diane Ablonczy joins 2015 exodus, won't run again
Ablonczy's decision follows similar news from Alberta MP Ted Menzies, who announced Tuesday he will not run in the next election. Ablonczy was first elected to the House of Commons in 1993 as a Reform MP. She is currently minister of state for foreign ...
